title: I Started Living With JK the Night My Wife Cheated on Me. We Are Now Living Happily Together and I Don’t Care if She Apologizes Now - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Childhood Love   Cohabitation   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Tomboyish Female Lead   Tragic Past   Younger Love Interests
author: Kanokura Iruka   鹿ノ倉いるか
description:
The same night I caught my wife cheating on me, a JK suddenly showed up at my house.

'If you let me stay the night, I can... do something naughty for you.'

'What?'

A strange new life together with a complete stranger, but somehow familiar, JK Reina begins.

Whenever she sees an opportunity, she tries to seduce me, but her words and actions are that of a virgin.

Before I knew it, my troublesome housemate had become a source of comfort for me.

One day, his ex-wife comes to him to apologize, and Reina snaps at her...

A heart warming and slightly tense love comedy between an older man and a JK!>
